name: SYSDATE
documentation: Current date in the format dd/mm/yyyy; e.g. 04/07/2005

name: SYSDATETIME
documentation: Current date and time in the format dd/mm/yyyy hh:mm:ss; e.g. 04/07/2005 13:50:45

name: SYSTIME
documentation: Current time in 24hr format hh:mm:ss; e.g. 13:50:45

name: SYSDAY
documentation: Current day of the month in the format dd; e.g. 04

name: SYSMONTH
documentation: Current month in the format mm; e.g. 07

name: SYSYEAR
documentation: Current year in the format yyyy e.g. 2005

name: SYSDAYOFWEEK
documentation: Current day of the week as an integer between 1-7 (Sun-Sat)

name: SYSHOUR
documentation: Current hour in the 12 hour format hh; e.g. 01 for 1PM or 1AM

name: SYSHOUR_OF_DAY
documentation: Current hour in the 24 hour format hh; e.g. 13

name: SYSMINUTE
documentation: Current minute in the format mm; e.g. 50

name: SYSSECOND
documentation: Current second in the format ss; e.g. 45

name: SYSAM_PM
documentation: Current period of the day, i.e. AM or PM

name: SYSTIMEMILLIS
documentation: Number of milliseconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 GMT; e.g. 1120481445961

name: SYSTIMENANOS
documentation:
Number of nanoseconds expressed in seconds

NB: This time is not related to any real time and can only be used to measure elapsed time

name: SESSION_ID
documentation: Current session ID

name: PROCESS
documentation: Name of the current process

name: PHASE
documentation: Name of the current phase

name: PHASESTACK
documentation: Pipe separated list of phases in stack

name: FULL_PHASE_PATH
documentation: The full path of current phase including any phase components being used.

name: CONNECT_ACTIVE_TAB
documentation: List of the current active tabs in a page

name: PRESENTATION
documentation: Name of the current presentation

name: THEME
documentation: Name of the current theme

name: ACTIONURL
documentation: The URL that the form POST's

name: QUESTION_CONSTRAINT
documentation: Used by appropriate validation messages to display the value of the constraint the question failed on

name: QUESTION_TEXT
documentation: Used by appropriate validation messages to display the label of the question

name: VALIDATION_ERROR_COUNT
documentation: If there are any mandatory errors or validation errors, this is a count of how many errors exist.

name: TABLE_CURRENT_PAGE
documentation: For tables with automatic paging, this indicates the current page of the table

name: TABLE_SORT_COLUMN
documentation: This indicates the index of the question which is being sorted on

name: TABLE_SORT_DIRECTION
documentation: This indicates the direction of the sort (ASC/DESC)

name: TABLE_LAST_PAGE
documentation: For tables with automatic paging, this indicates the last page of the table

name: APPLICATION_MODE
documentation: Application Mode

name: LANGUAGE_MAP_ALIAS
documentation: The alias for the currently set language map

name: LANGUAGE_MAP_CODE
documentation: The iso code for the currently set language

name: LANGUAGE_MAP_REQUEST_ALIAS
documentation: The requested alias for the language map to be set

name: HTTP_HEADER
documentation: Access to HTTP Header parameters by $$HTTP_HEADER.<parameter name>$

name: HTTP_REQUEST
documentation: Access to HTTP Servlet Request Object methods (those with no arguments) using $$HTTP_REQUEST.<method_name>()$

name: REQUEST_LOCALES
documentation:
The locales from the request formatted as a HTTP header Accept-Language parameter
For Example: en-gb,en:q=0.5

name: BROWSER_PAGE_BEEN_VISITED
documentation: If we are processing a browser navigation action whether the cached page has been visited before and is still in the user's phase stack. This will have a value of Y or N.

name: BROWSER_NAVIGATION_PHASE
documentation: If we are processing a browser navigation action where that cached page is expecting to go.

name: BROWSER_FEATURES
documentation: This will give access to whether a feature is available within the browser being used. To use this you will need to add the name of feature to the word, e.g. BROWSER_FEATURESinputtypes.date to check if the HTML 5 date input is supported.

name: LANGUAGE_MAPS
documentation: List of language maps defined for the project.

name: REMOTEUSER
documentation: Name of the windows logged on user (if supported by the Application Server)

name: NAMESPACE
documentation: Unique name for this portlet on an specific portal page

name: CONTEXTPATH
documentation: Name of the application context from the Application Server

name: PROJECT_NAME
documentation: Project name without extension

name: CONTROLLING_SERVLET
documentation: The name of the main controlling servlet required by calls to Ajax services

name: PROJECT
documentation: Project path and name without extension

name: PROJECTHOME
documentation: Project directory at runtime

name: PROJECTPATH
documentation: Location of the project file at runtime

name: DEPLOY_HOME
documentation: Folder into which deployments are stored

name: PRESENTATIONTYPE
documentation: Presentation type, e.g. Rich HTML, Pure HTML, Offline or Portlet

name: IMAGE_LOCATION
documentation: Client side location for images

name: HTML_LOCATION
documentation: Client side location for html files

name: JAVASCRIPT_LOCATION
documentation: Client side location for javascript files

name: STYLESHEET_LOCATION
documentation: Client side location for stylesheets

name: STARTUP_ERROR_MESSAGE
documentation: If the project startup rules failed then this will display that error message.

name: STARTUP_ERROR_CODE
documentation: If the project startup rules failed then if an error code is associated with the error this will display that error code.

name: SESSIONTIMEOUT
documentation: The session timeout value for the application

name: IS_RUNPREVIEW
documentation: Is the current process being run from the Developer IDE

name: RUNPREVIEW_PORT
documentation: The port number being used by Run/Preview

name: IS_USING_DATA_SETS
documentation: Is the project allowed to use data sets and has the project been set to use a data set.

name: EDGECONNECT_VERSION_INFO
documentation: The version information for edgeConnect

name: RTE_LICENSE_EXPIRY
documentation: The license expiration date for the application runtime

name: COMPONENT_ID_PREFIX
documentation: When a component has been called, contains the prefix to be used by component elements, e.g, C1: etc

name: COMPONENT_CALLER
documentation: When a component has been called, contains the name of the caller

name: COMPONENT_CALLER_ID
documentation: When a component has been called, contains the id of the caller and it's callers

name: LIBRARY_NAME
documentation: Library name without extension

name: LIBRARY
documentation: Library path and name without extension

name: LIBRARY_CONTEXTPATH
documentation: Name of the application context from the Application Server for the Library

name: LIBRARY_HOME
documentation: Contains the directory of the library

name: LIBRARY_PATH
documentation: Contains the location of the library file at runtime

name: COMPONENT_TYPE
documentation: Outputs the type of the current component, i.e. '' if not a component, otherwise 'PHASE', 'RULE' or 'ITEM_GROUP'

name: BROADCAST_MESSAGE
documentation: Message being broadcast from the Broadcast Rule

name: PORTLETACTIONURL
documentation: Portlet URL to POST form data and implement an action

name: PORTLETACTIONURL.PARAMETERS
documentation: Portlet URL with parameters that POST an action

name: PORTLETVIEWURL
documentation: Portlet URL to get a new view (refresh) without POSTing data

name: PORTLETACTIONNORMALURL
documentation: Portlet URL to POST form data and implement an action, show the portlet in Normal state

name: PORTLETVIEWNORMALURL
documentation: Portlet URL to get a new view (refresh) without POSTing data, show the portlet in Normal state

name: PORTLETACTIONMAXIMIZEDURL
documentation: Portlet URL to POST form data and implement an action, show the portlet in Maximized state

name: PORTLETVIEWMAXIMIZEDURL
documentation: Portlet URL to get a new view (refresh) without POSTing data, show the portlet in Maximized state

name: PORTLETACTIONMINIMIZEDURL
documentation: Portlet URL to POST form data and implement an action, show the portlet in Minimized state

name: PORTLETVIEWMINIMIZEDURL
documentation: Portlet URL to get a new view (refresh) without POSTing data, show the portlet in Minimized state

name: PORTLETWINDOWSTATE
documentation: Window state either "maximized", "minimized", "normal", values case sensitive

name: ERROR_WITHOUT_CODE
documentation: Error code to indicate that the error does not have a specific error code.

name: ERROR_UNABLE_TO_LOCATE
documentation: Error code for when the RTE is unable to locate a project or component library to be loaded.

name: ERROR_UNABLE_TO_LOAD
documentation: Error code for when the RTE is unable to load a project or component library due to an error during the parsing of the file.

name: ERROR_LOW_MEMORY
documentation: Error code for when the RTE is unable to load a project or component library due to low memory.

name: ERROR_PROCESS_NOT_FOUND
documentation: Error code for when the RTE is unable to find the required start process to use.

name: ERROR_BACK_NOT_ALLOWED
documentation: Error code for when the end user has tried to go back in a situation where it is not supported.

name: ERROR_FORWARD_NOT_ALLOWED
documentation: Error code for when the end user has tried to go forward in a situation where it is not supported.

name: ERROR_NO_NEXT_PHASE
documentation: Error code for when the end user has tried to go forward but there is no phase on the stack to go to.

name: ERROR_PHASE_NOT_FOUND
documentation: Error code for when the end user has tried to go to a phase that cannot be found.

name: ERROR_PHASE_NOT_VISITED
documentation: Error code for when the end user has tried to go back to a phase that has not been visitied.

name: COMPONENT_MAPPING_ERROR
documentation: Error code for when the invocation of a component has failed due to one or more mappings being in error, perhaps because they are out of date.

name: LM_ERROR_UNABLE_TO_LOCATE
documentation: Error code for when the RTE is unable to locate a language map.

name: LM_ERROR_UNABLE_TO_LOAD
documentation: Error code for when the RTE is unable to load a language map.

name: LM_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_TYPE
documentation: Error code for when the RTE is unable to locate a language map manager for the specified language map.

name: LM_ERROR_DUPLICATE_ALIAS
documentation: Error code for when the RTE is unable to load a language map because the alias is already in use.

name: LM_ERROR_UNKNOWN_ALIAS
documentation: Error code for when the RTE is unable to find the specified language map alias.

name: PRESENTATIONTYPE.LAYOUTCONTROL
documentation: Determine if current presentation is using divs or tables

name: PRESENTATIONTYPE.LAYOUTDIRECTION
documentation: Determine the direction of the layout

name: PRESENTATIONTYPE.DECIMALSYMBOL
documentation: The digit group symbol defined by the current presentation

name: PRESENTATIONTYPE.DIGITGROUPSYMBOL
documentation: The decimal separator symbol defined by the current presentation
